proc ngSpiceInit(printfcn: NGSendCharCb = ngPrintPassthrough;
                statfcn: NGSendStatCb = ngPrintPassthrough;
                ngexit: NGControlledExitCb = ngDefaultExit;
                sdata: NGSendDataCb = ngDefaultSendData;
                sinitdata: NGSendInitDataCb = ngDefaultSendInitData;
                bgtrun: NGBGThreadRunningCb = ngNoMultithreading;
                userData: pointer = nil) {...}{.raises: [Exception], tags: [RootEffect].}
Initialize ngspice library using set of callback functions. For each callback function see documentation of corresponding type.
